name: World In Danger
description: World In Danger is a top-down action shooting game with stealth elements. Embark on missions across the globe, taking out groups of enemies, rescuing hostages, disarming bombs. Face the unique boss fights the player encounters as the story unravels in this over the top action extravaganza.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Q9550, AMD equivalent or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1100 MB available space
